DzLogEvent Class Reference

Class for thread-safe status line updating. More...

#include <dzapp.h>

List of all members.

 DzLogEvent (QString statusStr, bool writeToStatus=true)

bool writeToStatus () const

Detailed Description

Class for thread-safe status line updating.

Create an instance of this event and post it to the DzApp object to write to the status line from a secondary thread, or a thread-safe function, in place of calling the DzApp::statusLine() or DzApp:log() functions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzLogEvent::DzLogEvent ( QString  statusStr,
bool  writeToStatus = true 
)

Constructs the event.

Parameters:
statusStr The line to write to the status bar and/or log.
writeToStatus If true, the line is written status bar, just as a call to DzApp::statusLine(), if false, the line will be written to the log file only as in DzApp:log().

Member Function Documentation

QString DzLogEvent::getString (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
The line that is to be posted to the status bar.
bool DzLogEvent::writeToStatus (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
true if the line should be written to the status bar, false if the line should only be written to the log file.
